verses:
Let us break bread together
on our knees;
Let us break bread together
on our knees.

Let us drink wine together
on our knees;
Let us drink wine together
on our knees.

Let us praise God together
on our knees;
Let us praise God together
on our knees.
chorus:
When I fall on my knees,
With my face to the risen Son,
O Lord, have mercy on me.
